Skills: Full TimeManager · 7 - 12 Yrs of Exp · IT/Software Development · Quality · Engineering - Telecom/Technology · Computer Science · Information Technology (IT) · SQL · ETL · Microsoft SQL Server · Data Developer · Data Stage
JopDescription:
Position Summary:

Responsible for the analysis of data integration requirements and the development of technical specifications.
Develops, tests, debugs and implements ETL jobs for existing and/or proposed data integration solutions.

Process Management:

Assists in the development of estimates for projects
Contributes to defining time tables and project plans
Assists in the definition of milestones

Project Coordination:

Performs all data integration life-cycle and quality assurance for the work of other team members, including the review of high-level designs, detail designs, developing ETL jobs, and test plans and results
Instructs, assigns, directs, and reviews the work produced by other team members on the Team
Reports status and issues to project manager as necessary
Assists in coordinating the implementation of changes to improve performance against metric targets
Provides support and on-the-job training to more junior or less experienced team members
Provides input to Team Leads on team member performance

Application Design:

Designs new data integration jobs (ETL) solution.
Translates functional requirements into technical requirements and design

Application Development:

Designs and codes complex ETL jobs and work packages
Evaluates complex data integration requirements and processes
Provides ETL jobs and user support and performs troubleshooting
Provides production support as necessary
Prepares the development environment

Testing:

Create, reviews and refines test cases, scenarios and scripts to ensure data integration quality
Prepares the test environment
Analyzes results of testing sessions and presents results
Works with users to review test results to ensure they meet expected results
Conforms to quality assurance test standards

Documentation:

Create documentation for end user describing the installation, use, and customization of data integration components as necessary
